Title: Element Overlay ASP.NET Extender Control
Description: The Element Overlay ASP.NET extender control extends the Dynamic Populate Extender (from the Ajax Control Toolkit) to display dynamic content superimposed over a specified HTML page element with a wash-out effect similar in the Modal Popup extender.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Element Overlay ASP.NET extender control extends the Dynamic Populate Extender (from the Ajax Control Toolkit) to display dynamic content superimposed over a specified HTML page element with a wash-out effect similar in the Modal Popup extender.

Features
  • Crunched JavaScript
  • Showing, hidden and populated client events
  • Inherits Dynamic Populate functionality

Requirements
  • AjaxControlToolkit version 4.1.404
  • Microsoft Ajax Minifier
  • .NET 4.0 (can be downgraded to 3.5 or 2.0 if needed)

Example
A sample application is provided to demonstrate the extender's capabilities.
